comments.body:
Looks good, but right now group_id can't be used with state present.
`"msg": "state is present but the following are missing: name"`
How about just specifying that it only can be used with absent? Or do you want me to enable the possibility to change security group attributes for specific `group_id`?

I think it would be fine to specify that group_id can just be used with absent. The ability to change security group attributes with the ID could be another feature request/pr. If you're itching to implement that have at it, but do whatever makes sense to you.
So I'd change this description here to required when I(state=present) or something.
Ok, so I've made a description change. Hope that it's ok like that.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +33,37 @@    description:
      - Name of the security group.
      - One of and only one of I(name) or I(group_id) is required.
      - Required if I(state=present).
    required: false
